Replies.Reply: This will begin to make things right.
"The General." To me, she's royalty.
You have to leave. Go!
Something far worse has happened to you.
The First Order rose from the dark side... you did not.
You may try, but you cannot deny the truth that is your family.
Well, because of you now we have a chance. The General's been after this for a long time.
BB-8 ENTERS FRANTIC, BEEPS. Concerned, Poe turns to Lor San Tekka.
We've got company.
You have to hide.
Come on, BB-8! Hurry!
I see 'em!
You take this. It's safer with you than it is with me. You get as far away from here as you can. Do you hear me?
So who talks first? You talk first?
It's just very hard to understand you with all the...
... Apparatus.
All right. All right!
Not really.
Might wanna rethink your technique.
The Resistance will not be intimidated by you.
If -- what--?
You with the Resistance--?!
I can fly anything. Why, why are you helping me?
You need a pilot.
We're gonna do this.
I am calm.
I always wanted to fly one of these things. Can ya shoot?
Okay, same principal! Use the toggle on the left to switch between missiles, cannons, and mag pulse --
I can fix this.
I got it!
Woooahhh! This thing really moves.
I'm gonna get us in position, just stay sharp!
Up ahead! Up ahead! You see it?
I saw it! Hey, what's your name?
FN-whaa?
Well I ain't using it! FN, huh?
I'm Poe. Poe Dameron.
Good to meet you too, Finn!
One's coming towards you. My right, your left. Do you see it?
Nice shot.
We're going back to Jakku. That's where.
I got to get to my droid before the First Order does!
That's right. He's a BB unit! Orange and white: one of a kind.
This one is, pal.
That droid's got a map that leads straight to Luke Skywalker!
Go straight ahead and don't let these dogs scare you!
WOOHOO!
So are you!
What happened? I got thrown from the crash, woke up at night -- no you, no ship, nothing--
BB-8 says that you saved him.
You completed my mission, Finn.
No, no, no. Keep it. It suits you.
Finn's familiar with the weapon that destroyed the Hosnian system. He worked on the base.
The scan data from Snap's reconnaissance flight confirms Finn's report.
I wish that were the case, Major.
This was the Death Star.
This is Starkiller Base.
We'll go in there and we'll hit that oscillator with everything we got.
So we disable the shields, take out the oscillator and we blow up their big gun. All right. Let's go!
Roger, base -- red squad, blue squad, take my lead.
Almost in range! Hit the target dead center, as many runs as we can get!
Let's light it up!
Yeah, we gotta keep hitting it!
Guys, we got a lot of company!
Red Four! Red Six! Cover us!
Everybody else, hit the target hard!
I need some help here! I need some help!
All teams - I'm going in! Pull up and cover me!
All teams! I got eyes on them!
Our job's done here. Let's go home!
Yeah, all right, buddy, hold on --
Stay here.
Look how old you've become.
You know what I've come for.
The map to Skywalker. We know you've found it, and now you're going to give it to the First Order.
I'll show you the dark side.
You're so right.
The old man gave it to you.
Search him.
Put him on board.
Kill them all.
I had no idea we had the best pilot in the Resistance on board.
I'm impressed. No one has been able to get out of you what you did with the map.
Where is it?
Where... is it?
It's in a droid. A BB unit.
I leave that to you.
General Hux. Is it the Resistance pilot?
... The one from the village. FN-
How capable are your soldiers, General?
They're obviously skilled at committing high treason. Perhaps Leader Snoke should consider using a clone army.
Then they should have no problem retrieving the droid. Unharmed.
I want that map. For your sake, I suggest you get it.
The droid... stole a freighter?
Anything else?
What girl?
Yes.
He means nothing to me.
By the grace of your training, I will not be seduced.

Forgive me. I feel it again. The pull to the light. Supreme Leader senses it. Show me again, the power of the darkness, and I will let nothing stand in our way. Show me, Grandfather, and I will finish what you started.
The girl I've heard so much about.
The droid.
Where is it?
The map. You've seen it.
Pull the division out. Forget the droid. We have what we need.
You're my guest.
You mean the murderers, traitors and thieves you call friends?
You'll be relieved to hear that I have no idea.
You still want to kill me.
Tell me about the droid.
He's carrying a section of a navigational chart. We have the rest, recovered from archives of the Empire. We need the last piece.
You know I can take whatever I want.
... You're so lonely... so afraid to leave...
At night, desperate to sleep... you imagine an ocean. I see it -- I see the island...
And Han Solo. You feel like he's the father you never had. He would've disappointed you.
I know you've seen the map. It's in there... and now you'll give it to me. Don't be afraid. I feel it too.
We'll see.
She's strong with the Force, untrained but, stronger than she knows.
Supreme Leader. I can get the map from the girl. I just need your guidance.
NO!
She's just beginning to test her powers. The longer it takes to find her, the more dangerous she becomes.
Put every hangar on lock-down. She's going to try to steal a ship to--
Han Solo...
Find them.
Han Solo. I've been waiting for this day for a long time.
What do you think you'll see if I do?
Your son is gone. He was weak and foolish, like his father. So I destroyed him.
No. The Supreme Leader is wise.
It's too late.
I'm being torn apart. I want to be free of this pain.
I know what I have to do, but I don't know if I have the strength to do it. Will you help me?
Thank you.
We're not done yet.
It's just us now. Han Solo can't save you.
TRAITOR!
That lightsaber. It belongs to me!
You need a teacher! I can show you the ways of the Force!
Sir, the villagers.
On my command!
Fire!
And who gave you permission to remove that helmet?
Report to my division at once.
FN-2187 reported to my division, was evaluated and sent to Reconditioning.
This was his first offense.
You're making a big mistake.
You can't be so stupid as to think this will be easy. My troops will storm this block and kill you all.
Yes, Captain.
I'm sorry, Captain.
This is a rescue, I'm helping you escape. Can you fly a TIE fighter?
What?
No no no! I'm breaking you out.
Because it's the right thing to do.
I need a pilot.
... Yeah?
Okay, stay calm, stay calm.
I'm talking to myself.
Not yet. Okay, go. This way.
Blasters, I can!
This is very complicated FWOOOOOOM! The TIE FIGHTER LURCHES FORWARD --
All right!
Okay, got it.
YES! You see that?! DID YOU SEE  THAT?
That's the only name they ever gave me!
What you've brought me today is worth... Hmmm... One quarter portion.
These five pieces are worth... Let me see here... One half portion.
What about the droid?
I'll pay for him.
Sixty portions.
Follow the girl and get that droid.
HEY!!!! THAT'S MIIIIIIINE!!!
Tal'ama parqual!
Parqual zatana!
NOMA.
Shhhh.
That's just Teedo. Wants you for parts. He has no respect for anyone.
Keep away from the Sinking Fields in the north, you'll drown in the sand.
BB-8 starts after her, BEEPS. She turns sharply, he stops.
Don't follow me. Town is that way.
No!
In the morning, you go.
You're welcome.
Don't give up. He still might show up. Whoever it is you're waiting for. Classified. I know all about waiting.
For my family. They'll be back.
Last week they were a half portion each.
What about him?
Actually... the droid's not for sale.
Finn is confused. Rey stands, staring at Finn, defiant.
What's your hurry, thief?
The jacket! This droid says you stole it!
Where'd you get it? It belongs to his master.
So you're with the Resistance?
I've never met a Resistance fighter before.
BB-8 says he's on a secret mission, he has to get back to your base.
Luke Skywalker? I thought he was a myth.
What is it?
What are you doing?!
Let go of me!
I know how to run without you holding my hand! BB-8 stay close! This way!
They're shooting at both of us!
Well, thanks for that!
Are you okay?
Stop taking my hand!
Hey!
Yeah.
Follow me.
We might in that quad-jumper!
We've got one!
That one's garbage!
The garbage'll do!
Gunner position's down there!
No! This ship hasn't been flown in years!
I can do this, I can do this--
WHAT?
BB-8, hold on!
I'M GOING LOW!!!
What are you doing back there? Are you ever gonna fire back?!
Not so easy without a co-pilot!
We're about to get some!
I hope.
Nice shot!
Get ready!
Oh no!
You're ok. He's with the Resistance.
I'm Rey.
Help me with this! Quick!
It's the motivator! Grab me a Harris wrench -- check in there!
If we wanna live, not good!
BB-8 said the location of the Resistance Base is "need to know" --
Pilex driver, hurry!
So where's your base?
The Ileenium system?
I'll drop you two at Ponemah Terminal.
I gotta get back to Jakku!
No, that one! No. No. The one I'm pointing to! No. NO. NO. If we don't patch it up, the propulsion tank will overflow and flood the ship with poisonous gas!
Yes!
None of your business, THAT'S WHY!
-- No it can't be --
Someone's locked onto us -- all controls are overridden.
Get off. Get off! See anything?
-- Yeah, but I fixed that --
Oooh...
You think this'll work on the Stormtroopers?
I'm hurrying!
...I'm the pilot...
No, it's true: we're the only ones on board.
Niima Outpost.
I stole it from Unkar Plutt. He stole it from the Irving Boys, who stole it from Ducain.
This is the Millennium Falcon? You're Han Solo?
No, the smuggler!
This is the ship that made the Kessel Run in fourteen parsecs...!
Wait! No -- we need your help!
This droid has to get to the Resistance base as soon as possible!
What's a Rathtar?
No.
What about BB-8?
What are you gonna do?
Can you see them?
They have blasters...
Wait wait wait wait. If we close the blast doors in that corridor, we can trap both gangs!
Resetting the fuses should do it.
Oh no.
Wrong fuses.
Huge!
What do they look like?
Are you sure?
FINN!
FINN!!!!
Finn!
That was lucky!
Han!
Unkar Plutt installed a fuel pump too -- if we don't prime that we're not going anywhere.
And you could use a co-pilot.
From inside the hangar? Is that even possible?
Compressor.
I can fix that!
Try transferring auxiliary power to the secondary tank--
I by-passed the compressor.
The First Order wants the map.
Finn is with the Resistance...
... I'm just a scavenger.
Go ahead.
Why'd he leave?
The Jedi were real?
... I didn't know there was this much green in the whole galaxy...
I think I can handle myself.
Yeah, you pull the trigger.
Rey.
Are you offering me a job?
You're offering me a job.
If you were, I'd be flattered. But I have to get home.
I've already been away too long.
Clean?
What fight?
Finn!
What about BB-8? We're not done yet. We have to get him back to your base.
What are you doing?
You can't just go. I won't let you.
Finn, what are you talking about?
Don't go.
What was that? I shouldn't have gone in there.
I have to get back to Jakku.
Luke.
I'm never touching that again. I don't want any part of this.
What are you doing?
You have to go back.
Safety!
You have to keep going, stay out of sight, I'll try to fight 'em off.
Where am I?
Where are the others?
That happens when you're being hunted by a creature in a mask.
He's a BB unit with a selenium drive and a thermal hyperscan vindicator --
-- Get out of my head --
I'm not giving you anything.
... You... you're afraid... that you will never be as strong as... Darth Vader!
You will remove these restraints.
You will remove these restraints.
You will remove these restraints.
And you will drop your weapon.
Yeah.
Finn. What are you doing here?!
... That it was your idea.
Thank you.
I can't explain it. And you wouldn't believe it.
No, no.
You're a monster!
The Force.
Finn! Finn...
We'll see each other again. I believe that. Thank you, my friend.
Where do you come from?
Well then. If it's on Jakku, we'll soon have it.
Use the ventral cannons.
Yes, and he had help.
From one of our own.
We're checking the registers now to identify which Stormtrooper it was.
Fire.
No prior signs of non-conformity?
Destroyed?
Disabled. They were headed back to Jakku -- the fighter's projected to crash in the Goazon badlands.
They were going back for the droid --
Supreme Leader Snoke was explicit.
I won't have you question my methods.
My men are exceptionally trained --
Careful, Ren. That your "personal interests" not interfere with orders from Leader Snoke.
Supreme Leader, I take full responsibility for th--
The weapon. It is ready. I believe the time has come to use it. We shall destroy the government that supports the Resistance, the Republic.
Yes, Supreme Leader.
Today is the end of the Republic!
FIRE!
Ren believed it was no longer valuable to us.
That the girl was all we needed. As a result, the droid has most likely been returned to the hands of the enemy. They may have the map already.
We have their location. We tracked their reconnaissance ship to the Ileenium system.
Begin charging the weapon!
Report.
Dispatch all squadrons...
Prepare to fire.
Supreme Leader.
The fuel cells have ruptured. The collapse of the planet has begun.
Ren wants the prisoner.
Turn here.
Listen carefully: you do exactly as I say, I can get you out of here.
Call in the air strike!
FN-417, hold position!
Traitor!
Don't move! TK-338, we have targets in custody!
We have incoming at two-eight-point-
Request air support!
Pull back the tree line!
We have an unsanctioned departure from bay two.
Alert General Hux and stop that fighter.
"Finn." Yeah, "Finn", I like that!
Good to meet you, Poe!
Hold on! I see it!
Where are you going?
No no no! We can't go back to Jakku!
What - a droid?!
I don't care what color he is! No droid can be that important!
We need to get as far away from the First Order as we can! We go back to Jakku, we die!
Oh, you gotta be kidding me!!! I--
Poe! Poe!
Poe!!! POE!
POE!!! POE!!!
Water... water... water..
-- Awgh, GAH!
What--?! Thief?
OW! HEY! What?!
I've had a pretty messed up day, alright?! So I'd appreciate it you stop accusing me -- OW!!!
It belonged to Poe Dameron. That was his name, right?
He was captured... by the First Order!
Obviously. Yes. I am. I'm with the Resistance, yeah.
I'm with the Resistance.
Well, this is what we look like.
Apparently he's carrying a map that leads to Luke Skywalker, and everyone's after it.
Come on!
Come on, BB-8!
No, we gotta move!
Yeah, they saw you with me! You're marked!
I'm not the one who chased you down with a stick! Does anyone have blasters around here?!
-- Are you okay?
We can't outrun them!
We need a pilot!
You?!
Y'ever fly this thing?
Great.
Whoa! I can do this, I can do this--
Whoa! Hey! Oh! Stay low! Stay low!
Stay low! It confuses their tracking!
I'm working on it! Are the shields up?
Try sitting in this thing!
We need cover, quick!
Damn it!
Come on... come on...
I'm getting pretty good at this!
The cannon's stuck in forward position, I can't move it! You gotta lose 'em!
Okay! For what?
ARE WE REALLY DOING THIS?!
Whooo!
Finn. What's yours.
Rey...
Whoa! What's going on?
How bad is it?!
They're hunting for us now, we gotta get outta this system!
This?
You gotta tell us where the base is.
Go on BB-8, tell her.
Please!
Yeah, the Ileenium system, that's the one -- get us there as fast as you can.
What about you?
BACK TO JAK--?! Why does everyone always wanna go back to Jakku?! !
This?
Hey. Rey. You're a pilot -- you can fly anywhere! Why go back?!
... That can't be good.
... Oh no.
It's the First Order.
You said poisonous gas --
Can you unfix it?
I got it.
I'm okay. BB-8 get off me...
Yeah. Their masks filter out smoke, not toxins.
Hurry!
You can understand that thing?
Thank you! Junkyard!
Han Solo? The Rebellion General?
Wasn't he a war hero?!
He's carrying a map to Luke Skywalker.
You are the Han Solo that fought with the Rebellion. You knew him.
Wait -- a what?! Did you just say Rathtars? Hey!
You're not hauling Rathtars on this freighter, are you?
Y'ever heard of the Trillia Massacre?!
Good.
THREE?! How'd you get them on board?
What about the Rathtars... where are you keeping them?
No.
A lot of 'em.
Close the blast doors from here?
Oh no, what?
This was a mistake!
They look like that.
This way!
REY!
It had me! But the door--!
No problem!
Chewie, come on! I need help with this giant hairy thing! Stop moving!
Hurt him?! He almost killed me six times!
Which is fine.
Replies.Didascalie: (Chewie GRABS HIM by the collar, ROARS)

Replies.Reply: You're welcome.
Do you know what happened to him?
Hey, Solo -- I'm not sure what we're walking into here --
Sorry. Han-- Mr. Solo. You should know, I'm a big deal in the Resistance. Which puts a real target on my back. Are there any conspirators here? First Order sympathizers?
Solo, why are we here again?
We can trust her, right?
Please, we came here for your help.
There is no fight against the First Order! Not one we can win. Look around. There's no chance we haven't been recognized already. I bet you the First Order is on their way right--
What's this? What are you doing?
Solo, what is she doing?
You don't know a thing about me.
You don't know the First Order like I do. They'll slaughter us. We all need to run.
Come with me.
I can't.
I was told you could get me to the Outer Rim.
Don't leave without me.
I'm not who you think I am.
I'm not Resistance. I'm not a hero.
Right into you. And you looked at me like no one ever had. I was ashamed of what I was. But I'm done with the First Order. I'm never going back. Rey, come with me.
Take care of yourself. Please.
It was the Republic.
The First Order, they've done it.
I need a weapon.
Thanks!
Woohoo! YEAH! That's one helluva pilot!
NO!! REY!!!
No, no, no, no... REY!!
He took her! Did you see that? He took her. She's gone!
Poe. Poe Dameron.
You're alive!
What happened to you?
No, no, no. It wasn't just me.
Oh here.
Poe -- I need your help.
Thank you, ma'am -- but a friend of mine was taken prisoner--
That's where my friend was taken --
It uses the power of the sun. As the weapon is charged, the sun is drained until it disappears.
There is one.
I can do it.
I can disable the shields. But I have to be there, on the planet--
Now you tell me?
How are we getting in?
We're gonna make our landing approach at lightspeed?!
The flooding tunnels are over that ridge. We'll get in that way.
Sanitation.
I don't. I'm just here to get Rey.
Solo, we'll figure it out! We'll use the Force!
Come on!
I have an idea about that.
Remember me?
Not anymore. The name's Finn, and I'm in charge. I'm in charge now, Phasma. I'm in charge.
Follow me.
You want me to blast that bucket off your head? Lower the shields.
Do it.
Solo, if this works, we're not going to have a lot of time to find Rey.
I disagree. What do we do with her?
Yeah, there is...
We'll use the charges to blow that blast door. I'll go in and draw fire, but I'm gonna need cover.
Hell no -- I'll go in find and try to find Rey --
-- The troopers'll be on our tail.
What happened -- did he hurt you?
We came back for you.
What'd he say?
How did you get away?
Solo.
The Falcon's this way.
Rey! Rey! Rey... Rey... Oh no. Oh no no no...
Come get it.
Sir, they've taken out our turbolasers--
Yes, sir. Bringing them online --
Sir. Ventral cannons hot.
Sir. We were unable to acquire the droid on Jakku.
It escaped capture aboard a stolen Corellian YT model freighter.
Not exactly, sir. It had help.
We have no confirmation, but we believe FN-2187 may have been helped in the escape--
The two were accompanied by a girl.
Chewie, we're home.
Where are the others? Where's the pilot?
You?
And "that thing" can understand you too, so watch it. Come on outta there.
Where'd you get this ship?
Jakku?! That junkyard?
Told ya we should've double-checked the Western Reaches!
Who had it, Ducain?
Who stole it from me! Well, you tell him Han Solo just stole back the Millennium Falcon for good.
I used to be.
Twelve! Fourteen.
Hey! Some moof-milker put a compressor on the ignition line!
-- Stress on the hyperdrive--
My help?
Yeah, I knew him. I knew Luke.
I'm hauling Rathtars.
Oh great. It's the Guavian Death Gang -- they must've tracked us from Nantoon.
I got three of 'em going to King Prana.
I used to have a bigger crew.
Get below deck and stay there until I say so -- don't even think about taking the Falcon.
He stays with me -- until I get rid of the gang, then you can have him back and be on your way.
There's one.
Same thing I always do: talk my way out of it.
Bala-Tik. What's the problem?
You know you can't trust those little freaks! How long've we known each other?
Ya think hunting Rathtars is cheap?
I never made a deal with Kanjiklub!
Tasu Leech. Good to see you.
Boys. You're both gonna get what I promised! Have I ever not delivered for you before?
What was the second time?
First I've heard of it.
... I got a bad feeling about this...
I got the door. Cover us!
Chewie! You okay?
Wow. Come on! Come on!
You, close the door behind us!
You take care of Chewie!
Hey, where are you going?
I hate that guy.
I got one, he's back there.
Watch the thrust, we're goin' out of here at lightspeed --
I never ask that question until after I've done it.
This is not how I thought this day was gonna go -- angle the shields --
Come on baby, don't let me down!
What?!
Electrical overload!
The coolant's leaking!
-- Secondary tank, I got it!
You hurt Chewie, you're gonna deal with me!
This hyperdrive blows there's gonna be pieces of us in three different systems.
What'd you do?
Move, Ball.
Nah, don't say that, you did great.
Good job, kid. And thanks.
So, fugitives, huh?
Let's see whatcha got.
This map's not complete. It's just a piece. Ever since Luke disappeared, people have been looking for him.
He was training a new generation of Jedi. One boy, an apprentice turned against him, destroyed it all. Luke felt responsible... He walked away from everything.
There're a lot of rumors. Stories.
I used to wonder that myself. Thought it was a bunch of mumbo-jumbo --
No, you rest.
You want my help? You're getting it. Gonna see an old friend. She'll get your droid home. This is our stop.
D'you just call me "Solo"?
Listen big deal, you've got another problem. Women always figure out the truth.
Always.
You might need this.
I know you do. That's why I'm giving it to you. Take it.
You know how to use one of these?
There's a little bit more to it than that. You got a lot to learn. You got a name?
Rey. I've been thinkin' about bringing on some more crew, Rey. A second mate. Someone to help out.
I wouldn't be nice to you. It doesn't pay much.
I'm thinking about it.
Well?
Jakku?
Chewie, check out the ship as best you can.
It's too bad. Chewie kind of likes you.
To get your droid on a clean ship.
Do you think it was luck that Chewie and I found the Falcon? If we can find it on our scanners, the First Order's not far behind. Want to get BB-8 to the Resistance? Maz Kanata is our best bet.
Relax, kid. She's run this watering hole for a thousand years. Maz is a bit of an acquired taste, so let me do the talking. And whatever you do, don't stare...
Any of it.
Hey, Maz!
Chewie's working on the Falcon.
Maz, I need you to get this droid to Leia.
Leia doesn't want to see me.
I don't know, but it ain't good.
Keep it, kid.
Where'd you get that?
Come on, Chewie!
Hey, can I try that?
I like this thing.
You okay, Big deal?
It's the Resistance.
Quick!
Yeah, yeah, I know...
You changed your hair.
No, new jacket.
... I saw him. Leia, I saw our son.
Leia...
Do what?
I'm trying to be helpful!
Listen to me, will you? I know every time you... every time you look at me, you're reminded of him.
There was nothing we could've done.
There was too much Vader in him.
We both had to deal with it in our own way. I went back to the only thing I was ever good at.
We lost our son, forever.
If Luke couldn't reach him, how could  I?
So it's big.
Okay, how do we blow it up?
There's always a way to do that.
We disable the shields.
Kid, you worked there, what do you got?
I like this guy.
We'll get you there.
If I told you, you wouldn't like it.
Chewie, check that donal capitator.
That's what I did it. So you'd miss me.
It wasn't all bad, was it? Huh?
Some things never change.
Their shields have a fractional refresh rate. Keeps anything traveling slower than lightspeed from getting through.
Alright, Chewie, get ready.
And Now!
I AM PULLING UP!!!
I get any higher, they'll see us!
What was your job when you were based here?
Sanitation? Then how do you know how to disable the shields?
People are counting on us! The galaxy is counting on us--!
That's not how the Force works--!
Oh really, you're cold?
The longer we're here, less luck we're going to have. The shields?
Bring it down. Bring it down.
Don't worry kid, we won't leave here without her.
Is there a garbage chute? Trash compactor?
You sure you're up for this?
Are you all right?
Good.
Escape now. Hug later.
They're in trouble. We can't leave.
That girl knows her stuff.
We'll set the charges at every other column.
You're right. That's a better idea.
You take the top.
I'll go down below. Detonator.
Ben!
Take off that mask. You don't need it.
The face of my son.
That's what Snoke wants you to believe but it's not true. My son is alive.
Snoke is using you for your power.
No it's not. Leave here with me.
Yes. Anything.
Han Solo. You are a dead man.
The problem is we loaned you fifty thousand for this job.
I heard you also borrowed fifty thousand from Kanjiklub.
The question is how much longer will we know each other? Not long. We want our money back now.
Kanjiklub wants their investment back, too.
Tell that to Kanjiklub.
Yeah.
Your game is old. There's no one in the galaxy left for you to swindle.
That BB unit... the First Order is looking for one just like it. And two fugitives.
Kill them! And take the droid!
Inform the First Order that Han Solo has the droid they want. And it's aboard the Millennium Falcon.
Wrong again, Solo. It's over for you.
Twice!
Nowhere left for you to hide.
Search the freighter.
The droid will soon be delivered to the Resistance...
... Leading them to the last Jedi.
General! Our strategy must now change.
Go. Oversee preparations.
There's been an awakening. Have you felt it?
There's something more. The droid we seek is aboard the Millennium Falcon. In the hands of your father, Han Solo.
Even you, master of the Knights of Ren, have never faced such a test.
We shall see. We shall see.
This scavenger, resisted you?
And the droid?
Then the Resistance must be destroyed before they get to Skywalker.
Good. Then we will crush them once and for all. Prepare the weapon.
If what you say about this girl is true, bring her to me.
Leave the base at once and come to me with Kylo Ren.
It is time to complete his training.
At what?
Han Solo!
Where's my boyfriend?
I like that Wookiee. I assume you need something. Desperately. Let's get to it.
A map to Skywalker himself? You're right back in the mess.
Hmm. No. You've been running away from this fight for too long. Han, nyakee nago wadda. Go home!
The only fight: against the dark side. Through the ages, I've seen evil take many forms. The Sith.
If you live long enough you see the same eyes in different people. I'm looking at the eyes of a man who wants to run.
You see those two? They'll trade work for transportation to the Outer Rim. There, you can disappear.
Who's the girl?
That lightsaber was Luke's. And his father's before him and now, it calls to you!
Han told me.
Dear child. I see your eyes. You already know the truth. Whomever you're waiting for on Jakku, they're never coming back. But... there's someone who still could.
The belonging you seek is not behind you. It is ahead. I am no Jedi, but I know the Force. It moves through and surrounds every living thing. Close your eyes. Feel it.
The light. It's always been there.
I've had this for ages...
Kept it locked away.
A good question for another time.
Take it! Find your friend!
Those beasts! They're here!
Rey and BB-8, they need you. Now go.
You have one!
Alert the Resistance. Their missing droid is here!
Inform the First Order... I've found the droid.
NO!
No, come back!
Quiet, girl!
Copy that!
Yeah, I'm on it!
Furillo's been hit!
We're overwhelmed! What do we do?
Watch out!
We're with you, Poe!
They've somehow created a hyper lightspeed weapon built within the planet itself.
We're not sure how to describe a weapon of this scale.
Approaching target.
I got one behind me. See it?
Watch out for ground fire!
Yes!
Goodness! Han Solo! It is I, See-

General, I regret to inform you, but this map recovered from BB-8 is only partially complete. And even worse, it matches no charted system on record. We simply do not have enough information to locate Master Luke.
Princesses.
It is very doubtful that R2 would have the rest of the map in his backup data.
Oh my. Without the Republic fleet, we're doomed.
Thank the Maker!
And their weapon will be fully charged in 10 minutes! It would take a miracle to save us now.
R2-D2! You've come back! You found what? How dare you call me that!
Find Master Luke how? Come, R2! We must go tell the others at once!
General? Excuse me, General?
R2-D2 may contain some much needed good news.
Oh! The map! It is complete!
Oh my dear friend. How I've missed you.
Same jacket.
And I need to talk to him. That was incredibly brave, what you did.
Han told me about the girl, I'm sorry.
We're desperate for anything you can tell us.
And I will do everything I can to help, but first you must tell us all you know.
I can't believe I was so foolish to think that I could just find Luke and bring him home.
Don't do that.
Anything.
When did that ever help? And don't say the Death Star.
You think I want to forget him? I want him back!
That's why I wanted him to train with Luke. I just never should have sent him away. That's when I lost him. That's when I lost you both.
We both did.
No.
It was Snoke.
He seduced our son to the dark side.
Luke is a Jedi... you're his father.
The First Order: they're charging the weapon again, now.
Our system is the next target.
Han's right.
Han, how?
No matter how much we fought, I've always hated watching you leave.
I did miss you.
... Pretty good.
True. You still drive me crazy.
If you see our son again, bring him home.
Han did it! Send them in!
Tell me.
-- Luke --
Rey.
May the Force be with you.
General, the reconnaissance report on the enemy base is coming.
Yes, sir. Weapon charging.
Weapon at full capacity in thirty seconds.
A laser cannon?
It's another Death Star.
... Maybe the planet.
How is it possible to power a weapon of this size?
They have defensive shields that our ships cannot penetrate.
The Oscillator's still standing.
The Oscillator's been damaged but is still functional.
In order for that amount of power to be contained, that base would need some kind of thermal oscillator...
If we can destroy that oscillator, it might de-stabilize the core and cripple the weapon.
Give Poe full authorization to attack.
Sir, she was not found in hangar 718 but all troops are on alert.
General, their shields are down!
X-wings coming back for another round of attacks!
Weapon charged in fifteen minutes, sir.
Hey!
Black Leader, go to sub-lights. On your call.
Dropping out of lightspeed.
Black Leader, there's a brand new hole in that oscillator. Looks like our friends got in!
Yes, General.
Lieutenant, get back to your station!
But no damage!
Roger!
I'm hit!
Why are you doing that? Why are you doing -- this? I'm trying to come up with a plan.
General, are you seeing this?
Two more X-wings down. That's half our fleet destroyed.
Admiral, their weapon will fire in two minutes.
We just lost R-1!
Copy that, Black Leader! Good luck, Poe!
Just look. We won't survive -- even Hux has gone!
Easy, easy. He's hurt. We've got a heartbeat.
